00020 import VetPet.*;
00021 import VetPet.Menu.*;
00022 
00023 public class AddCat extends MenuCommand
00024 {
00025         public AddCat()
00026         {
00027                 super("Add Cat");
00028         }
00029 
00030         public boolean executeImpl(Console input) throws Exception
00031         {
00032             VetPetSystem sys = VetPetSystem.getSystem();
00033             String name = input.nextLine("Enter vet name: ");
00034             VetClinic vet = sys.getManager().getVetClinic(name);
00035             
00036             String ID = input.nextLine("Enter ID: ");
00037             String dname = input.nextLine("Enter Name: ");
00038             String type = input.nextLine("Enter Type: ");
00039             String toy = input.nextLine("Enter toy: ");
00040 
00041             if( vet.addCat(dname,ID,toy,type) == false)
00042                 throw new Exception("inncorrect ID number");
00043 
00044             System.out.println("The cat has been added to the system\n");
00045              
00046             return true;
00047         }
00048 }
